summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Boren Avenue North from John Street to Denny Way, and Denny Way from to Westlake Avenue in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewer under Ordinance No. 14496,creating Local Improvement District No. 1306 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
